feat: complete Phase 4-1 Pyodide runtime testing

Phase 4-1 Summary:
- E2E tests: 3/3 passed (100%)
- Fixed Python import issues in 30 methods
- Verified singleton pattern with 44x performance improvement (11.8s -> 0.27s)
- Confirmed Pyodide + NumPy + SciPy working in browser

Key Changes:
- pyodide-statistics.ts: Added import statements to all 30 runPythonAsync calls
- pyodide-basic.spec.ts: Fixed getAttribute issues and rewrote Test 3 for consecutive calculations
- Documentation: Added complete reports and daily log

Performance Results:
- First calculation: 11.8s (with Pyodide initialization)
- Second calculation: 0.27s (cached instance)
- Improvement: 97.7% (44x faster)

Next Steps:
- Phase 4-2: Test 10-15 additional statistical methods
- Performance optimization
- Advanced visualizations

Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")
